body:
I'm thinking of making another map for Avicus
But I need a build server to build on,if anyone would be kind enough to provide me a server,I would very much appreciate and would include your name in the credits of the making of the map ^_^
My skype is Tekcrezec162,contact me if you want to help out C:
Thanks for reading!

title: Build Servers?
